name: Space Babosos
description:
The ugly space babosos are decided to invade our planet. Unfortunately, you are the last line of defense, ¿you don't expected that, uh? Sorry, but the argument is equal simple to the game itself. Never mind, if you have 10 minutes free you'll find some fun battling against hordes of fun and slobbering invaders. Make combos to get a better high-score and try to beat the ten levels to get the rewarding ending screen.

This game is my first project made in Godot Engine. Simple, but works and gives fun!
